author: alita85
content: <@301186049323958275> I'm building the erc vs core feature right now but I'm finding some eips don't have the definition header defined. But they do have a type defined. Do we have some sort of mapping between the two?

author: alita85
content: On the case an eip doesn't have either classifications should I throw and error or just mention both core and erc editors?

author: sky.cactus
content: Do you have an example of what you are talking about?

author: alita85
content:
It's neither erc nor core which is what the feature was initially based on. I can also add more options for the different types though
Networking, interface, meta, informational

But I don't know if we want to group some of these into erc or core as to make it more streamlined. The implementation complexity is roughly the same regardless, though.
